Kup:

"We must to plan it very carfully my friend."said Kup"Hydras isnt stu=
pid, and regarding that your scape was few days ago, he still will be with =
his guard up..."


From: Sandy 
Sent: Tuesday, March 16, 2010 12:47 PM
To: =
nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Back to the Ark


  
Tucson thought fo=
r a moment,and then, he could sense something, the signature of a very fami=
lliar friend. 

" I think I know how we can do that Kup.. As it turns out, =
we're not alone.. I - just picked up another Autobot signature... It's Nigh=
t Shift, he made it... He actually made it out of that last skirmish unharm=
ed.. According to the transmission I'm getting, he's at the old Maximal bas=
e. Night Shift is specially trained in Special Ops mission work. When in do=
ubt send in a specialist. Prowl and Mirage trained him personally, and with=
 your guidence and his help, I think we have a good chance at doing things =
without being discovered. Night Shift also knows how to pretend. One time, =
he actually cloaked his Autobot symbol and made it appear Decepticon so he =
could sneak around Megatron without being suspected of double crossing.....=
 Wait a minute... Kup, what if he did that for us again? What if he went in=
 as a pretender, cloaked the Decepticon faction symbol and his signature to=
 match theirs, could he actually pull off a rescue right under their noses?=
"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, <airly2002@...> wrote:
>
> Kup:
> 
> "We =
will get them back My friend"Said camly the male"We must to plan it well in=
 order to dont have another mia"
> 
> 
> From: Sandy 
> Sent: Tuesday, Marc=
h 16, 2010 11:31 AM
> To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
> Subject: Re: Back to th=
e Ark
> 
> 
> 
> Before he could answer Kup, Tucson listens to the voice of=
 the Matrix,Kup and to Lord Elder. Once again they had caught him just in t=
ime to pull him from what could have been an emotional disaster. He was tha=
nkful for that.
> 
> " I guess I don't know the difference between being to=
o self absorbed and when it's all right to actually state how valuable one =
self is to a cause. I have to stop doubting myself as far as worth is conce=
rned. I'll kick myself in the aft to improve if I have to." 
> 
> He then t=
hinks about his disability and pauses for just a moment.
> 
> " Well, now t=
hat I need to kind of change gears for a moment, I suppose I should see mys=
elf as an innovator, who's self worth is rather valuable to the cause of tu=
rning things around for everyone and not just for himself. I'm not saying I=
'm a God, and that to me would be far too fetched. But now, if I were to ra=
te my self worth, I'd say my role as an Autobot is valuable. If I had not p=
ersisted in trying to find out what happened to Rodimus, not only would I n=
ot have found him, I would not have been able to stop the same thing from h=
appening to others. And now that I do realize what's going on, and the fact=
 that I could have nearly fallen down the same path, which I hope never to =
do, thanks to all of you, and the voice I keep hearing, I can finally do so=
me real good around here. And I promise, I'll work with each and every one =
of you, to the best of my abilities,
> and try to come up with new ways upo=
n which to do so."
> 
> Another pause.
> 
> " Now that I've woken up a bit,=
 I suppose I'd like to be able to see again, I just haven't really gotten a=
round to asking someone on how to repair my visual circuitry... Heh, truth =
is, I'm one of the biggest procrastinators on Cybertron. I guess I've just =
been putting it off too long, after getting used to not having my sight, it=
 just became second nature to me. And in some respects, perhaps I did not w=
ant to actually "See" the truth of the situation. And of course, major conf=
ession coming out here... At the time, Ratchet was doing repairs and well I=
 didn't want to burden him with anything... He had enough going on. After a=
 while I completely forgot and then another major war happened and before I=
 knew it I lost track of time.. But now there is time for the repair. I jus=
t need to have my circuitry examined before it is repaired... I don't know =
the extend of my damages truthfully.."
> 
> He sighs.
> 
> "I'm not good at=
 tolerating bad news, you probably already know that."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y=
ahoogroups.com, Preston Carroll <supercyclonus@> wrote:
> >
> > > > What am=
 I worth? How can I be worth something when there are lives just starting o=
ut there that are more precious than my own? And how can I say I'm worth so=
mething when we have young aspiring Autobots and Maximals just starting the=
ir careers as soldiers? They have their whole lives ahead of them, and by P=
rimus I'm prepared to give back what's been taken from them, THEIR FREEDOM!=
"
> > 
> > "All sentient being have worth young Tuscon." comes that whisper=
 again
> > as Tuscon positioned himself near to the body of Optimus. "If yo=
u do
> > not count your self as worth anything how can any one else see you=
 as
> > worthy of anything?"
> > 
> > Even as the voice spoke to Tuscon, Lo=
rd Elder chimed in, unknowingly
> > agreeing with the whispered voice, "You=
 know, you sound like Rodimus.
> > He used to say things like that. He woul=
d get depressed when he
> > failed. Even if he won the battle, he would som=
etimes find things that
> > he missed."
> > 
> > "Yes Tuscon" the whispered=
 voice continued. "Do not tie your sense of
> > self to your successes, but=
 to your efforts to achieve that success.
> > Who you are defines your valu=
e, not what you have you have achieved."
> > 
> > Another whispered voice, =
also presumably from the Matrix inside
> > Optimus, "Tell me something Tusc=
on, we are not biological creatures
> > but technological, yet you are blin=
d, why have you chosen to remain
> > so? could it be because you choose to =
remember the pain of loss or
> > failure?"
> > 
> > Another voice whispered=
 to Tuscon, this one sounding a little like
> > Optimus himself, "Do not ma=
ke the mistake that Rodimus has made. He
> > lost the energy matrix and him=
self in that loss. He will need your
> > help to remember his own value. On=
ly then can the power of the matrix
> > help him. But first *you* must see =
his value, and your own."
> > 
> > (TAG)
> > 
> > Preston
> >
